attributes.action: prevent in the english language the use of "kids" to describe children.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe this americanised slang term to describe children is innapropriate for use in the english language and is derogatory towards our children. We would urge legislation against it's use and for the BBC to cease using the term forthwith.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
